headline: Why Caterpillar Stock Crawled Higher on Thursday
summary: No less than two analysts upgraded their recommendations on the specialty vehicle and equipment maker.  This was thanks to a pair of post-earnings analyst recommendation upgrades, which brought a fresh wave of optimism to the stock.  In his view, Caterpillar now rates an outperform (buy, in other words), up from his previous tag of perform (hold).

headline: Caterpillar raised at Baird as negative catalysts now baked into expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Baird upgraded Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) to Neutral from Underperform on Thursday, raising its price target for the stock to $309 from $300 a share.

headline: Caterpillar Inc (CAT) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Navigating Challenges with Record ...
summary: Caterpillar Inc (CAT) reports a 10% revenue decline but achieves a record $5 billion organic backlog growth, showcasing resilience amid market challenges.
